DOC.brief_summary: This study provide pharmacokinetic data MVI 100 ( 100 mcg ) misoprostol vaginal insert administer nulliparous woman term gestation require cervical ripen induction labor .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Safety 100 Mcg Misoprostol Vaginal Insert ( MVI 100 )
DOC.detailed_description: PK study woman require cervical ripening .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman ≥36 week 0 day inclusive gestation ; Aged 18 year old ; Candidate pharmacologic induction labor ; Singleton pregnancy ; Baseline modify Bishop score < 4 ( see Appendix B ) ; Nulliparous ( nulliparous define previous birth live dead 24 week gestation ) ; Written inform consent . Women hemoglobin level < 11.0 g/dL ( confirm within one week study drug insertion ) ; Women active labor ; Presence uterine cervical scar uterine abnormality e.g . bicornate uterus . Biopsies , include cone biopsy cervix , permit ; Administration oxytocin cervical ripen labor induce agent ( include mechanical method ) tocolytic drug within 7 day prior enrollment . Magnesium sulfate permit prescribed treatment preeclampsia pregnancy induct hypertension ; Severe preeclampsia mark CNS finding , HELLP syndrome , endorgan affliction ; Suspected confirm cephalopelvic disproportion and/or fetal malpresentation ; Diagnosed fetal abnormality ; Suspected confirm intrauterine growth retardation ( le 10 % estimate fetal weight date ) ; Any evidence fetal compromise baseline ( e.g. , nonreassuring fetal heart rate pattern meconium stain ) ; Receipt NSAID ( include aspirin ) within 4 hour study treatment ; Ruptured membrane ≥48 hour prior start treatment suspected chorioamnionitis ; Fever ( oral aural temperature > 37.5C ) ; Any condition vaginal delivery contraindicate e.g. , placenta previa unexplained genital bleeding time 24 week pregnancy ; Known suspect allergy misoprostol , dinoprostone , prostaglandins excipients ; Any condition urgently require delivery ; Unable comply protocol .
